elements.text: You're working on a project at home. You're having difficulty moving on to the next task and find yourself repeatedly going back to double-check small details you've already completed, causing you to feel frustrated by the lack of progress. After taking a break, you remember that taking a step back is the smart thing to...

elements.name: Difficulty Moving On_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
